title: Windows Tiny7 Ultimate x86 Activated VMWare 11 Virtual Machine
description:
This is a VM created using VMWare 11.1.2 and is fully activated and updated.

====================== Table of Content ======================


This VM Includes the following :

* Bluestacks installed

* .NET Framework 4.5 (Latest to date)

* Microsoft Updates

* Hard Disk Space : 20 GB

* Memory : 1.8 GB

* Processor : 1 CPU 1 Core (Visualization Enabled)

* Network Adapter Removed (Must add manually from settings)


========================== Instructions ========================


1.Open the VM in VMWare 11

2.Create your own Network Adapter from the VM Settings

THIS NEXT STEP IS IMPORTANT :

3.When asked if you "Moved It" or "Copied It" make sure you choose "Copied It"

4.Hope that it works and cross your fingers
